ResponseText: You are correct. That fossil species have gone extinct is an observation. Right. It's called stasis. Species that are well adapted to their environments tend to change little in a stable environment. It is still true that fossil crocs are not the same as modern crocs. There are obvious differences. Deep ocean is probably the least changed environment on earth. That's were modern coelacanths live.
